meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Susan Torsell-Damico Tim Anderson Greg Draves Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6625.

td.p: Susan Torsell-Damico, a retired bookseller from Hamburg, New York
Tim Anderson, a Spanish professor from Rockford, Illinois
Greg Draves, an MBA student from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,800)

tr.td: ALICE IN WONDERLAND
WILL THE REAL CHEMICAL ELEMENT PLEASE STAND UP?
EUROPEAN HOLIDAYS
LIFE OF BRIAN
TIME FOR SOME HAIR CARE
SPLIT "N"s
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with an "N" and end with an "N".)
